scheme_name: Subsidy Scheme for Establishment of 100 Broiler Birds' Farm for Schedule Caste (Gujarat)
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to Scheduled Caste individuals for establishing a poultry farm with 100 broiler birds to promote self-employment.
key_features: Subsidy of Rs. 10,000 for setting up a 100-broiler bird farm

category_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Caste
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Gujarat

special_notes: Limited to broiler poultry farming for Scheduled Caste individuals
